metadata.title: CVE-2024-26922 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/amdgpu: validate the parameters of bo mapping operations more clearlyVerify the parameters of amdgpu_vm_bo_(map/replace_map/clearing_mappings)in one common place.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-26922` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.15.0-226-generic - 4.15.0-226.238
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-226-generic - 4.15.0-226.238
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-226-lowlatency - 4.15.0-226.238
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro
